Package no.hiof.webframework.application

Class App

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.application.App
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockApp, TestableApp
public class App extends Object
The App class is the core class of the application, responsible for managing the web server and handling HTTP requests. It uses the Singleton pattern to ensure that only one instance of the class exists at any given time.

The class maintains a collection of routes and associated HTTP methods, and provides methods for adding custom or pre-built HTML pages and responses to specific routes. It also allows a custom controller to be added for handling dynamic content, and pre-defined Chatroom applications.

Example usage of a simple scenario: 

 App app = App.create();
 app.addRoute("login", HttpMethod.GET);
 HtmlFactory factory = new HtmlFactory();
 app.addHtmlPage(factory.createLoginPage(), "Login title");
 app.run();

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static App create()
      Method used to create only one instance of the App-class.
      Returns:
      The application object.

    • addRoute

      public void addRoute(String endpoint, org.eclipse.jetty.http.HttpMethod httpMethod) throws NullPointerException
      Adds a new route to the application.
      Parameters:
      endpoint - URI value of the URL.
      httpMethod - Method to be used (e.g. GET, POST, PUT etc.)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If one of the parameters is null.

    • addHtmlPage

      public void addHtmlPage(InputStream htmlPage, String title)
      Adds a ready-made html page to the specified route, where all the html and css is pre-built.
      Parameters:
      htmlPage - InputStream of the html page. You can get this from the HtmlFactory.
      title - Sets the title of the page.

    • addCustomHtmlPage

      public void addCustomHtmlPage(String page)
      Adds a custom html page to the application.
      Parameters:
      page - The html page as a String. Can get this from the build() method in the HtmlPageBuilder class.

    • addCustomHtmlPage

      public void addCustomHtmlPage(String page, UserDb user)
      Adds a custom html page that is connected to a user database.
      Parameters:
      page - The html page as a String.
      user - User database from 'UserDb' class.

    • addResponseToPage

      public void addResponseToPage(String response)
      Adds a response as a String to a page with no html content.
      Parameters:
      response - The response to be delivered on the page.

    • addController

      public void addController(Controller controller)
      Adds a controller to the server.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller to be passed.

    • addChatRoom

      public void addChatRoom(Chatroom room) throws ChatMethodException
      Adds a chatroom to the application instance. If the chat method is not set in the chatroom object, a ChatMethod exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      room - The chatroom object to be added to the application.
      Throws:
      ChatMethodException - If the chat method is not set in the chatroom.

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts and run the application by initializing a server and a chatroom (if one is provided) on a separate thread. The method also turns off the logger before initializing the server.

    • incrementPageCounter

      protected void incrementPageCounter()
      Increments the pageCounter by 1 when called.

    • setCustomPage

      protected void setCustomPage(String content)
      Sets the custom page variable in the App class.
      Parameters:
      content - The content to be set (a string value).

    • getRouteMap

      protected Map<String,Route> getRouteMap()
      Getter used to retrieve the route map collection.
      Returns:
      A 'LinkedHashMap' containing Strings and Route-objects.

    • getHtmlPageMap

      public Map<String,HtmlPages> getHtmlPageMap()
      Getter used to retrieve the html-page map collection.
      Returns:
      The 'LinkedHashMap' containing Strings and HtmlPages.

    • getResponse

      protected String getResponse()
      Getter used to retrieve a response for pages without html content.
      Returns:
      The response as a String.

    • getCustomPage

      protected String getCustomPage()
      Getter used to retrieve the content of a 'custom' html page.
      Returns:
      The custom page as a String.

    • setApplicationTitle

      public void setApplicationTitle(String title)
      Setter used to set the title of the application.
      Parameters:
      title - A String value representing the title.

    • getDbUser

      protected UserDb getDbUser()
      Getter used to retrieve the user-database.
      Returns:
      A UserDb object.

    • getInstance

      protected App getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the App object.
      Returns:
      The instance to be returned.
